definition.name: Pull Request Action
definition.description: A GitHub action to open a pull request
definition.author: vsoch

outputs.name: pull_request_number
outputs.description: If the pull request is opened, this is the number for it.

outputs.name: pull_request_url
outputs.description: If the pull request is opened, the html url for it.

outputs.name: assignees_return_code
outputs.description: The add assignees post return code.

outputs.name: reviewers_return_code
outputs.description: The add reviewers post return code.

evidence.reasoning: The action is primarily focused on opening a pull request, which is a form of communication within the development workflow. It also facilitates the deployment process by managing code changes.
